price: 35. Ils y auront tout ce qu’ils désireront, et Nous en avons beaucoup plus encore.
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna fīhā waladaynā mazīdun
